scripts.install:backend: cd bounsic-back && powershell -Command python -m venv venv && powershell -Command "venv\Scripts\activate;pip install -r requirements.txt"
scripts.install:streaming: cd streaming && powershell -Command python -m venv venv && powershell -Command "venv\Scripts\activate;pip install -r requirements.txt"
scripts.install:backend_linux: cd bounsic-back && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:streaming_linux: cd streaming && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install: bun run install:frontend && bun run install:backend && bun run install:streaming
scripts.install_linux: bun run install:frontend && bun run install:backend_linux && bun run install:streaming_linux
scripts.start:backend_linux: cd bounsic-back && source venv/bin/activate && python -m app.main
scripts.start:streaming_linux: cd streaming && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 4000
scripts.start: concurrently --names "frontend,backend,streaming" "bun run start:frontend" "bun run start:backend" "bun run start:streaming"
scripts.start_linux: concurrently --names "frontend,backend,streaming" "bun run start:frontend" "bun run start:backend_linux" "bun run start:streaming_linux"
scripts.test:frontend_linux: cd bounsic-front && export CHROME_BIN=/snap/bin/chromium && bun run test
